response.text: Have you ever heard of coins that give you superpowers?
I can't say I have, that sounds like a myth.
It's not a myth, I assure you. I've come across coins that are said to give the holder the power of invisibility, the ability to control the elements, and even immortality.
Wow, that is hard to believe. How do you know these coins are real?
I've seen the effects with my own eyes. Of course, these coins are extremely rare and valuable. But, if you ever come across one, make sure to hold onto it tightly.
